name: Normal Attack
content1: A basic physical strike aimed at one nearby enemy.
content3: Reliable and cost-free. Best used when conserving resources.

name: Healing Light
content1: Summon radiant light to mend a target's wounds.
content3: Try to keep at least 3 mana on hand if you’re the only healer.

name: Fire Burst
content1: Unleashes a blast of flame in a short cone ahead of you.
content2:
• Deals 2d6 fire damage
  • Hits up to 3 enemies in front arc
content3: Best used when enemies are clustered. Be careful of friendly fire!

name: Shadow Chain
content1: Summon binding shadows that attempt to immobilize your target.
content2:
• Target must make a Strength save (DC 12)
  • On fail: Cannot move for 1 round
content3: Great for interrupting runners or stalling stronger foes.

name: Barrier Aegis
content1: Create a glowing barrier around yourself or an ally.
content2:
• Absorbs up to 10 damage
  • Lasts 2 rounds or until broken
content3: Time this before a big hit for maximum value.

name: Mighty Strike
content1: Channel your physical prowess into a devastating blow.
content3: Your current Physique skill ({{skills[0]}}) makes this ability particularly effective.
